title: Chocolate and orange iced biscuits
description: These pretty biscuits are flavoured with orange zest and cocoa. For this recipe you will need a template to cut out the biscuits (see tip) or a 6cm/2½in round biscuit cutter, 5 piping bags fitted with small plain nozzles and an electric mixer.
ingredients: 330g/11½oz plain flour, plus extra for kneading
gel food colouring in green, orange, red and yellow
